p: We characterized the niche of the species ( Appendix 2). For temperature axes, we found species currently occupying from −12.2 °C to 31.4 °C; for annual precipitation, we found species occupying from 0 mm to 1,104 mm. The spatial analyses indicated that current and future (refugia) species distribution areas were significantly different ( t-test) for the 4.5, 6.0 and 8.5 models ( Fig. 1; p < 0.05).
